actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that the United States holds in trust for the pueblo of Santa Ana certain public domain lands.

summary.text: Provides that the United States holds in trust for the Pueblo of Santa Ana specified public domain lands in the State of New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to declare that the United States holds in trust for the pueblo of Santa Ana certain public domain lands.
